directions: Mix half-and-half, sugar, and pumpkin pie spice together in a coffee mug. Pour coffee into mug; stir to blend.
Heat in microwave until hot, about 15 seconds. Top with whipped cream.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
1 tablespoon whipped cream topping, or to taste (optional)
title: Easy Pumpkin Spice Latte
